scripts.dev: npm run purs:build && npm run purs:serve
scripts.build: npm run purs:build && npm run purs:bundle
scripts.purs:bundle: mkdir -p dist && npx esbuild output/Main/index.js --bundle --outfile=dist/app.js --format=iife && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); let c=fs.readFileSync('dist/app.js','utf8'); const m=c.match(/var (main\d*) = [^;]*runHalogenAff[^}]*}\)\);/); if(m){c+='\nsetTimeout(function() { if(typeof '+m[1]+' !== \'undefined\') '+m[1]+'(); else console.error(\''+m[1]+' not found\'); }, 0);'; fs.writeFileSync('dist/app.js',c); console.log('Added deferred '+m[1]+'() execution');} else {console.error('Main function not found');}"
